name: shy-excel-wasm
description: A pure WebAssembly / Javascript port of Go Excelize library

scripts.dev: yarn run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development rollup -w -c scripts/rollup.config.dev.mjs
scripts.build: yarn run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production rollup -c scripts/rollup.config.prod.mjs

author: downloadxu
